content: Spotify raised their prices in Canada recently so I tried their free offerings. Do not recommend. Ads are intentionally annoying and constant. Many basic features, like playing songs in order, going back a song, or not having random songs added to your listening queue by the algorithm, are gated behind Premium. At least if you pay for YouTube Music, you get no-ads YouTube thrown in for free. Paying for Spotify only gets you Spotify.

The best music app ever and the family premium feature is really helpful as I now have infinite skips. The lyrics also helped me sing along to the songs. Also the fact that I can now download music to listen to when there is no WiFi or signal. You can even listen to it on airplane mode which is helpful for holidays. Overall amazing app with every single that I can think of and much much more.

Choose premium simply because ads that interrupted my listening were too annoying. Huge & updated collection of EDM. New DJ X that picks up the kind of music you listen to then plays similar tunes along with a few of your most listened tracks in between is great. Too lazy to search, bored of your old play list...hit DJ X & you have your own radio station!

Doesn't even load in. I had to re download the app more than 5 times. I even re connected to my internet over and over. Nothing happens. Not only does it not load, or let me sign in anymore. Spotify doesn't even play my Playlist.. I play Sabrina Carpenter, and the next song is rock even tho I'm listen to a only Sabrina Playlist. Either way. I'm done with the app.

I paid premium for about year, and the main reason for premium was to be able to play offline. But Spotify always couldn't play my offline downloaded songs once I've been away from Wi-Fi for few minutes. I would try to even refresh the list by playing it while online first, but it would still be unplayable just few minutes of being offline. Then I decided there's no use of having premium subscription...

I can't say a lot since I generally pay for premium and it is generally an amazing app. Only problem is it keeps lagging - the music- but I'm switching headphones soon so that's probably it. To inform people who are complaining about JUST ads, get premium, there's more to it than just no ads, seriously. But great app, would be a five if there was 0 lag but again, it's the headphones.

while i am a long time premium user, i REALLY HATE it that everytime i open my playlist, the same songs are in the queue. i tried changing playlist, restarting the app, yet everytime i open my liked songs that have hundreds of songs, the same song stays in the same queue. I use smart shuffle bcs i like spotify suggesting songs based on my playlist, but its just the same queue with different added songs in between. That's your favourite song, not mine, stop shoving it down my throat

Awful! I pay for premium, yet I've never been able to watch a whole Joe Rogan podcast without it freezing. Trying to watch the latest one with John Danaher has me screaming at my phone! Each time it stops it resets to the beginning, so annoying! There are also adverts within the podcast, why! I'm not paying to hear adverts from you! There are lots of things about YouTube that I don't like, but their platform is infinitely better than this one! 4 years after writing this review, it's even worse!
replyContent: Hi! We’re sorry to hear this and thanks for letting us know. We’d like to investigate further. If you have time, could you reach out to our Customer Support team again with a screenshot of your review and our reply? You can reach them at https://support.spotify.com/contact-spotify-anonymous/.

content: This app is just garbage now. None of the basic features work properly. You can’t even choose the song you want—everything is on shuffle unless you pay. Constant ads after every few minutes, it’s super annoying! Every tap just leads to a prompt begging for premium. What’s the point of offering a free version if it's unusable? Honestly, it feels like they’re forcing you to pay. Uninstalled. Not recommended at all.

Can I give the Spotify app 0/5 stars? because across the better part of a decade, 3 different phones, reinstalls, and countless updates, it is still the worst functioning app on my phone by far. Always glitches, freezes, jumps to different episodes randomly. Honestly pathetic it's still so bad at this point.
replyContent: Hi. We're open to feedback, and we'd love to get some more info about this. If you have the time, give our Customer Service a shout. You can find them by heading to support.spotify.com and searching "Contact us".

content: Spotify has gone from really good to annoying and bad app in the past 5 years. User experience just get worse all the time and gets problems that makes you feel should you just change into another service. e.g. it changes your playlist while listening or can't show history what you have listened if played from auto-generated list. finding new music is not easy and has lots of AI generated music or fake artists that fills your auto-generated playlists.
replyContent: Hi. We're open to feedback, and we'd love to get some more info about this. If you have the time, give our Customer Service a shout. You can find them by heading to support.spotify.com and searching "Contact us".

content: What kind of music streaming app is this? You can't choose your song, you cant skip, what the hell is this app for then? As a student who cant afford premium, how do you think people with go with your extreme ways? Theres a limit for EVERYTHING. No way, i cant even choose my own song to listen to in a streaming app? The app was so much better before all of this. Please dont download this, it'll just make your blood boil. You can't even choose a song to listen to, yet this is a streaming app.

at first, I think in 2023 everything was right but recently they added even the most common features into premium like playing a song or playing songs in a queue, like why even have the playlist feature when to play songs in order you need to buy premium?! i try to play songs and it tells me to buy premium, to play a song, ON A MUSIC APP! if they don't change this premium bs quick then I think i'll stop using Spotify and switch to another app, also the other recent reviews are also bad!!

Many things are good about Spotify, notably the great choice of music etc. But one thing annoyed me forever: The home page. Keeps filling itself with appaling "suggestions" and there is no way to change that or customise anything. The option has been demanded by >10000 people for years. There is no dislike button, so listening to personalised radios, the same rubbish comes up. Another terrible UX issue: It is very easy to accidently click a wrong button and instantly lose 1000s of downloads.
replyContent: Hi. We're open to feedback, and we'd love to get some more info about this. If you have the time, give our Customer Service a shout. You can find them by heading to http://support.spotify.com and searching "Contact us".

content: I really love this app but I don't know if I'm the only one who experience this problem. Maybe it's some kind of a bug. Everytime I listen to a song then decide to change it to another song, it takes lot of time to switch. Even though I already tap the song that I want to play, the previous song was still playing and won't stop. It never happened to me before, it started last last month. I hope that it will be fix as soon as possible.

content: I've paid for Spotify since 2016 and half the time I wonder what I'm paying for. The app crashes quite a lot and its pretty slow. The playlist that spotify make themselves, like best of the decade? I don't know who chose the artists but it was ridiculous! I will definitely consider switching to another music provider.

This is my best music app ever. welldone Spotify team. I love the new Ai DJ feature, I only wish you could make the Ai DJ something I can communicate with so I can tell it the kind of songs I want to listen to.... instead of it playing songs from my favourite list. I love the songs no doubt but sometimes I'll want to listen to something new. Please make available 6 months or 1yr subscription plan,I don't like the monthly plan. Thank you as I look forward to it's improvement.

Had Spotify for years! very loyal customer pay for myself and my daughter to have it however these last few days can't get onto it! keeps saying error, won't let me log in in any way, shape or form, keep getting error and when I try to access spotify support for help, again I get error!!! and won't let me access support online!! I've done everything Google tells me to do to fix it with no good reult, still can't access my account.

Please make a setting option that allows me to just play one podcast episode at a time. Currently I have to set a sleep timer every single time I listen to a podcast, because otherwise it will keep playing an endless queue of other podcast episodes once the one I'm listening to has ended. Updated review: still 2/5... I can't listen to audiobooks because I'm on a family plan? So silly and doesn't seem fair.

I love using Spotify, although I just don't like the new update since I cannot move the song backwards or forward, and second was that I feel upset on how I cannot replay my song over and over again and it immediately changes to a new song that is related to the context am listening although this new feature is okay but I prefer the past ones since at this point your making half of it premium.

App used to work but now its full of bugs and software issues like a mine field, you go into your liked songs, can only scroll down a few times before it refuses to load any more, when you do manage to get down there if you click next song it just plays as if its shuffled when shuffled isnt enabled , if you minimise the app and go back it just takes you to the top of the list instead of being where it was left at, just ruining the experience. still broken even after following the steps

content: What once was one of the best streaming apps for discovery has lost something serious. Now playlists and recommendations are just flooded with junk I'd never listen to. It used to be so well curated and a great way to find new music. Now it's just the top ten plus some fluf.

Like I'm giving this s 1 star review it's cuz of one feature so like Spotify does this that if you have reached a certain amount of songs it will just stop giving you the songs which you wanna play even if you create a playlist for yourself . This is actually pretty annoying to deal with because we just cannot listen to the songs we want except for premium users like dude let us listen that's why I have recently switched to yt music cuz it's just better. Very disappointing Spotify please change

Worst experience than ever. The updates add more ads and nothing else. The shuffle algorithm is so poor that it will play only recently played everytime. I have my own playlist I have to manually select the song because if I wait till the algorithm selects it I guess it would probably take a year. Edit.. I have premium plan now can't much difference. Even I can predict what it will play next. It's so obvious. Only good thing is no annoying 2 minutes ads

content: From the latest update, there is an issue related to the fast forward or back of the song...it asks for a premium account to do such a very basic task... which makes the app unusable ... now you cant even play songs. songs always starts with smart shuffle which create so many issues when you like to play any specific song. this app is an example of how greed of human destroy already existing good thing.

content: Why are you constantly showing pop up continue listening on x speaker in sonos when I was not playing anything via Spotify? This popup is really annoying and will force me to try other premium services. Can you not leave it alone when it works? Who asked for this feature, check the forums lots complain about it. content: I've tried time and time again to cope with Spotify, but even after years of development it is still incredibly lacking. content: I love the number of songs on here, but I find the app very difficult to navigate. I just want the entire songs list and not a shortened version. I also don't like random songs being added to my playlist automatically, I only want the songs I choose. It should be optional to add suggested songs.
replyContent: Hey! You can always add more tracks to your playlists to replace the ones we recommend. For more info, head to support.spotify.com > search for Create playlists > Suggested songs.

content: this app sucks. but its the only music app ive been using so far. you can only listen to whatever you want for only 4 times a day, for me at least. and when i say only 4 times, IT is only 4 times. the app is infested with ads and now it looks like only a premium user could only enjoy it fully. oh how i miss the earlier days of spotify. I used to be a premium user, but stopped because its not worth my money at all. Is this even a Free music app? or a money grabber?

its good, but still alot of problems. for example, sometimes it doesnt let you listen for useless reasons like "location change",it doesnt show the lyrics to every song and it had too many ads. i also recommend adding romaji lyrics for japanese songs or english lyrics for non-eng songs! :3

Spotify has a tight grip on music streaming, but the cost of the product for the quality you get now is not comparable anymore. I think Spotify is greatly overcharging its customers for a service that they aren't trying, or planning, to improve. I would advise others to use YouTube or buy your music on Bandcamp etc. At least the artist gets more money that way.

it's useless for going to the free version and thus paying for premium and its quite nice features that should be in the free version like playing the way u want and sliding which point u wanna play and I get it the ads are acceptable but they almost blocked u to "LISTEN" music and bordered it just pay and play thing so my conclusion is: Ads are fine but atleast let us "PLAY THE MUSIC" the own way we want repeat and remove useless shuffle block.

It's a very good app but it keeps giving me issues There was a time where I had to install and uninstall the app twice become it refused to add or removes songs from from my liked list and at that time also I couldn't even download And now another issue of network. This network issue has been going on since I started using this app and it's so frustrating So I hope you could do well to improve your app

content: i gave it 3 stars because it's a good app and i can manage the unpaid version. HOWEVER, the other two are missing because since for the past 5 months or so, it has always been telling me that i'm offline when my mobile data is on. my brothers thought i mistakenly set it to offline mode, meanwhile that feature doesn't even exist on mine. please fix this.

content: App keeps auto redrawing the playlist when I navigate away to another app and return to Spotify. So it keeps going back to the top of the list. Very frustrating especially with larger playlists. I've turned off all battery saver options on my phone it's not the issue. Please fix! Ty

content: The free experience is getting worse daily. I won’t open this app again until I can play the songs I want. First, you controlled the playback order—fine. But now I can’t even choose a specific song? That’s too much, especially when other apps let me do exactly that. If I’m getting ads, can’t pick songs, and can’t control playback, why stay? This will only push users away and hurt Spotify’s own ad revenue.

content: Might as well just make it a completely paid app, the free version is annoying and really tests your patience. With the new updates, you can't play the song you want, it's pointless if a music app doesn't play the song you want. I think the premium version is great, though. The free version, on the other hand, is literal trash.

content: Spotify is the most dysfunctional app on my phone by a country mile. Countless playback errors and issues, daylist fails to update and is faulty, the algorithm on shuffle plays the same sequence of songs (regardless of if you try to reset this) etc etc. Poor execution on what are some great ideas for a streaming app.

great app, love premium features and that I can have an account for each member of my family, even the kids. Don't like that podcasts do not play in the order I have sorted them in. if I sort reverse chronological then I want them to play in that order. I constantly need to stop then manually scroll to change to next podcast according to how I have sorted them as it always starts playing the previous episode I have already heard. Especially when I am in the car...

fix your damn app Spotify! this thing constantly is full of bugs. Will not load home screen, stops in the middle of a podcast and changes randomly to another or an earlier episode you have already listened to, losses your spot on a podcast. sometimes won't work at all. this is with a premium subscription. get it fixed already

Honestly, Spotify is great when you have premium. It was so funny to me how it made me an offline playlist the day the blackout happened on Monday (28/04/25) and I could listen to music. it's so important for me my music and I don't get ads too, so it's the best. 💯 recommend, and if you can't get or don't want to get premium and you have patience, then I suggest you still get Spotify!

This app is second to none and has been a great source of my most favourite songs. It's suggestions have helped me find songs I'd long forgotten, and the radio feature has introduced me to music I may not have otherwise come across. I also enjoy excellent podcasts on here. I absolutely recommend this app 😎

Great app but with flaws. It has great functionalities and sound quality. practical UI as well. However, even with the prices going up yet again, there are core issues that still haven't been fixed. such as Playlist repeating the same 10 songs on shuffle, friend functions buried in searches, organization issues, and discovery being pretty limited on short term patterns.

Love this app, use it every day and have been for many years. I don't like the new update with the queue system, even if I set the playlist to repeat, it doesn't show the next song in the queue when it reaches the last song before it starts over. The feature to queue multiple songs at once is also gone, you have to do it one by one. The same goes for removing songs from the queue. It's also annoying that ads play before and after a podcast episode, even though I have Premium.

Spotify is amazing and I love it because it allows me to play my music wherever I go. However, in the latest update, things happened to the queue. For a long time while having Spotify, I was able to actually move, reorganise and delete the songs in my queue. Now I can't. That really annoys me. Another thing is with the DJ for paid users. It's amazing, but the cutouts of songs when going in and out of the song is really irritating. If you could, could you try to fix this? Then It'll be five stars

Unfortunately, the Spotify mobile app experience leaves much to be desired. The ability to only listen to music in random order without a premium subscription is an extremely inconvenient and intrusive limitation. Other services offer basic sequential playback functionality at no extra cost, and this seems logical. I understand that the company is trying to monetize the product, but such limitations are off-putting to users.

Okay. I love Spotify but, the updates sorta trash. 1. Non premium users can only skip through songs 6 times each hour. Like why? What if you need to skip, or you wanna choose a different song? 2. You can't view your songs anymore. I mean, you still can but, it's just words. So therefore, you can't change/choose songs. In short, the update is more a downgrade :/ If you changed it back, then that'd be awesome!

Music is great. But the thing is, I clicked one song, and it gave me like 10 adds. Some repeated and it's extremely repetitive, and annoying. Plus if you want to listen to music at different places you have to pay? What?! Okay, I get that you have to pay for offline. But the rest is completely unreasonable. I got so many adds etc.. about different things, And it's very, must I say again annoying. I do recommend this app if you want to listen to music, but if you hate adds, this is a no go. 🚫

All of the great experiences I had were eroded by multiple interactions with the customer service to fix a simple problem. I didn't see any problem-solving mindset to resolve the issue—at least not as obvious as the excitement to increase subscription fees severally. The issue: I am no longer able to add PLAYLISTS to a playlist folder on MY PHONE, but I can still do that on my PC. I have cleared my cache, storage, and re-installed the app, but the issue persists.

I don't use Spotify for music any more. I use it for podcasts. It used to be a decent app when I started but with each update it's getting worse. Gone are fast forward, skip, speed controls from the login screen. Now the speed control resets to 1x after every use, and the episode history is gone too. I realize that podcasting is not its primary function but I still can't understand taking away of the features. I'm done.

The audio difference between music and advertising is ridiculous. I know you want people to pay for your app, but this seems like a really shoddy thing to keep doing. This was a meme years ago, but it seems worse now than ever. lately I've been getting 4 of the same, obnoxiously loud adverts in a row when listening to podcasts. If there was a good alternative I'd go there. But unfortunately there isn't. The vast collection of music is pretty good though.

This app frustrates me often. It will just stop functioning normally. I can't select a particular song to play; it will only allow me to play the whole library. Force-stopping the app doesn't solve the issue, nor does clearing the cache. Connectivity between devices can be hit and miss. Sometimes it won't play "downloades songs" if there is no internet connection. The day I find the energy to rebuild my music library in a different app, I'm cancelling my subscription.
replyContent: Hi! Does logging out > restarting your device > logging back in make any difference? If it doesn't, can you try a quick reinstall? If the issue persists, we'd suggest reaching out to our Customer Service team at support.spotify.com. Just search "Contact us", and they'll be happy to help.

content: The content is good and enjoyable. However, the application's tendency to start automatically, especially when connecting the phone to a car, can be quite disruptive and annoying. Additionally, the navigation experience within the app feels unintuitive, particularly when searching for specific episodes of a podcast or content.

For me, I totally recommend using this app if you want to listen some music or even podcast that can help you focus and vibe with the song! I have been using this app for more than 3 years from now and I love this Free streaming service app where all podcasts, live streaming, remixes and radio stations are all free to listen, including spotify premium! Although, I am having issues with this app after I updated it.. It won't load the home page even If I'm connected to the internet. Pls fix it!

I've had Spotify for years, but lately, the app has been filled with bugs, which ruins the listening experience for me. I had an issue where every time I tried to listen to songs from "my liked songs," it would freeze. I was only able to listen to music from my curated playlist's and I had to delete the app, just for it to work again and re-download all my music. Also, when I pick a categorized genre to listen to on my liked songs, it doesn't play songs from those genres. Please fix this issue!

Two things are infuriating, related to the queue: 1) it is not possible to go back to the previous song(s) played. After a song finishes, it is simply gone from the queue. And makes it even more difficult, with the inclusion of 2); 2) it is not possible to add a song or album to "play next" on the queue. Say you have a queue of 200 songs, you have to insert a song to the end of the queue, and drag it all way to the top to listen to next. It is like having an old broken cd player. PREMIUM USER

I love spotify so much, I've been using it since 2019. But recently the chromebook version has not been working well for me. The past 2 weeks it won't load whenever I open it up, so I have to uninstall it, reinstall then log back in. And I've had to do this every single day, every time i reopen the app. What's even more annoying, when I have something on loop like an album, when it's finished, it just plays suggested songs which I don't want at all. I'm really annoyed and tired by this
replyContent: Hi! We're sorry to hear reinstalling the app didn't help. For playback issues, check if "Repeat" is enabled and turn off Autoplay; search for "Autoplay" at https://support.spotify.com/. If the Chromebook app isn’t loading, please search for "Contact Us" on our Support site to reach Customer Service. They’ll be happy to assist you!

content: Really sick of ads in a different language!!! Everything is set to English... yet french ads... Support was no help whatsoever!!! Also don't say I live close to the border or something, I'm a six-hour drive away... update now I'm getting Cantonese ads too... Called support and still no help... I reset the App cleared the cache, and uninstalled it, but nothing worked...
replyContent: Hi! We’re sorry to hear this and thanks for letting us know. We’d like to investigate further. content: The app works good. There are a few things bothering me about the queues tho. I would like to see my queue history (songs before the one currently playing) so if i want to go back to a song i dont have to skip backwards, but just click on it, without changing my queue. Also it would be great if the songs i add with "add to queue" actually stay there after they are played. In my experience these features were present in every music app i used before Spotify and i believe then to be very useful.

this app is great if you want to mindlessly listen to whatever is trending or what the algorithm says you must like. HOWEVER, if you are interested in truly discovering new music, learning about it, this app is completely useless. How is it possible that Spotify deliberately HIDES all of the metadata of the music you listen to? you can't access or filter genres, years, country of origin, NOTHING! and now it seems that they hid the date added of the liked songs?! for what?? is my data.

I used to get this as part of my phone contract at reduced (£4.99) rate. This is no longer the case since it went up from £9.99 to £11.00. I'm not paying that because streaming only works when theres a signal. If they reduced the monthly cost and offered podcasts and audio books etc. as add ons (which aren't necessary for me) I might consider it.

it's an amazing app, but for what its worth, it could use some improvements, too Agressive ads that make the listening experience way more intrusive than, say, radio ads, or TV ads. And i've had friends tell me about pointless bugs that their spotify shows. Over-all, the experience feels like you're using the best app for music, but it has the economic strategy , and bugs of a cheap-made mobile game.

I have premium. Getting increasingly pissed off with how the app is acting, especially because I pay for it. It pauses and closes randomly, kicks me out of jams and clears queues. These are things that happen for my friends and myself. I'm being very polite about this, to be clear. I'm aware that there are several other issues that people have, especially with the free version. Get it together.

I've had years of very happy listening with Spotify. In recent months (I estimate 2-3), it has been incredibly glitchy. the most common form this takes is that when I press play, it plays for one second or less, then pauses again. I have tried force quitting the app and restarting and made sure the app is up to date. This has been so common and is incredibly frustrating. I can't help but wonder about other platforms and whether they offer better basic function.
replyContent: Hi. We're open to feedback, and we'd love to get some more info about this. If you have the time, give our Customer Service a shout. You can find them by heading to http://support.spotify.com and searching "Contact us".

content: this used to be an amazing app where you could explore so many songs, podcasts ect. Now we have to listen to an add every 2 minutes? we have skip limits? we can only put on a song certain amount of times? it's horrid. YouTube music is better than this and it has thousands of adds. what's the point of calling it a free app if we can't even listen to music freely? daymn.

Bug: filter by an artist in your liked songs, play a song, then skip to the next song. The song that is played is not in the list of filtered songs. Google pixel 7. content: Amazing app, I listen to music on spotify for at least 2 hours a day. There is one problem tho. Too. Many. Ads. Spotify used to have less ads but I feel like they keep adding more and more and they also become longer 20-30 second ads. In one spotify ad it says "enjoy the next 30 mins of ad free music" but after 10 mins I get more ads. That is the only problem with spotify. Other than that amazing app

This app is just too limitated for people who can't afford the premium plans (wich are kinda expensive) like, I personally have no freedom towards the music I wanna listen to, you can't go backwards, can't pass more than 6 songs every hour, not to mention you can't select the songs you want, you just simply can't vibe at all, I get that you need to put adds, I personally do not care, but that? It makes listening to music something frustrating, I'm gonna stop using this app till this changes

It was a good app... 5-7 years ago. Now in addition to all the glitches - it can't even make filters work. I have thousands of songs in my liked list, but whatever filter i put - upbeat, rock - it just plays latino songs. So i have to hand craft all my lists for workouts etc. Which makes it just any usual app, plus glitches, plus confusing interface, plus more expensive. There's very little left to like in this app. And ever rising cost of premium subscription
